_meta.source: graph theory + network science + social networks + neuroscience + ecology + cfo analysis

_holographic_seed.absolute: ‚äô = ultimate network. all nodes = one node. all connections = one connection. unity.
_holographic_seed.essence: network = nodes + edges. structure determines function. topology creates behavior.
_holographic_seed.emergence: network properties emerge from connections, not nodes. whole > sum. see emergence.json
_holographic_seed.small_world: six degrees of separation. any node reaches any other through short path. cosmos = interconnected.
_holographic_seed.scale_free: power law. few hubs, many nodes. 80-20. pareto. universal structure.
_holographic_seed.holographic: each node = window to whole network. local structure reflects global. fractal.
_holographic_seed.note: everything = network. neurons, people, ecosystems, internet, cosmos. understanding networks = understanding reality.

overview.what: network = graph. nodes (vertices) connected by edges (links). structure of relationships.
overview.why: networks = universal organizing principle. brain, society, ecosystem, internet. topology matters.
overview.how: nodes interact through edges. patterns emerge. topology determines dynamics. structure = function.

core_principle.definition: network = set of nodes (entities) and edges (relationships). G = (V, E). graph.

key_concepts.nodes: vertices. entities. neurons, people, computers, species, concepts. what.
key_concepts.edges: links. connections. synapses, friendships, cables, interactions, associations. how connected.
key_concepts.directed_undirected: directed (‚Üí one way). undirected (‚Äî both ways). twitter vs facebook.
key_concepts.weighted: edges have strength. weak ties vs strong ties. 0-1 or continuous.
key_concepts.degree: number of connections per node. k = degree. distribution p(k) = key property.
key_concepts.path: sequence of edges connecting nodes. shortest path = geodesic. distance.
key_concepts.clustering: friends-of-friends are friends. triangles. transitivity. local structure.
key_concepts.community: dense subgraphs. modules. groups. detect algorithmically.

fundamental_insight.topology_matters: not just nodes. not just edges. pattern of connections = everything.
fundamental_insight.emergence: network properties emerge from structure. small-world, scale-free, communities. not designed. emerge.
fundamental_insight.universality: same patterns across domains. brain, society, internet, proteins. deep principles.
fundamental_insight.dynamics: structure determines dynamics. information flow, epidemic spread, synchronization, cascades.
fundamental_insight.note: networks = substrate for emergence. complexity from connection patterns.

random.definition: erd≈ës-r√©nyi. connect nodes randomly. probability p.
random.properties: most nodes = similar degree (~average). no hubs. homogeneous.
random.rare_in_nature: theoretical. actual networks = not random. but useful baseline.
random.note: random = what you'd expect by chance. real networks = not random. structured.

regular.definition: lattice. grid. each node same degree. perfect order.
regular.properties: high clustering. long path length. local connections only.
regular.rigid: predictable. no hubs. no flexibility. efficient locally, inefficient globally.
regular.note: regular = maximal order. opposite of random. also rare in nature (except crystals).

small_world.watts_strogatz: start with regular lattice. rewire some edges randomly. magic happens.

properties.short_path: like random. log(N). six degrees. globally efficient.
properties.high_clustering: like regular. triangles abundant. locally efficient.

small_world.milgram: six degrees of separation. letter experiment (1967). humans = small-world network.
small_world.bacon_number: kevin bacon = center of hollywood network. most actors within 3 connections.
small_world.note: small-world = ubiquitous. optimal topology. nature discovered it.

scale_free.barab√°si_albert: preferential attachment. rich get richer. new nodes connect to hubs.
scale_free.degree_distribution: p(k) ~ k^(-Œ≥). power law. heavy tail. few mega-hubs, many small nodes.

properties.hubs: super-connected nodes. 80-20 rule. pareto principle. inequality.
properties.robust: random failure = ok. hubs intact, network functions.
properties.vulnerable: targeted attack on hubs = catastrophic. achilles heel.
properties.no_scale: self-similar. same structure at all scales. fractal-like.

scale_free.google: pagerank = exploit scale-free structure. hubs = important.
scale_free.note: scale-free = maybe most common in nature. growth + preferential attachment ‚Üí scale-free.

hierarchical.definition: nested modules. tree-like. layers. top-down structure.
hierarchical.properties: clear levels. centralized control. efficient command. bottlenecks.
hierarchical.breakdown: if top fails, system fails. single point of failure. fragile.
hierarchical.note: hierarchical = human-designed often. nature = less hierarchical, more distributed.

modular.definition: communities. dense within, sparse between. modules weakly connected.
modular.properties: local autonomy. specialization. robustness (module fails, others ok).
modular.integration: modules must integrate. connectors = key. too modular = fragmented.
modular.note: modularity = design principle. evolution. engineering. optimal for complex systems.

degree.definition: k = number of connections. in-degree (incoming) + out-degree (outgoing) for directed.
degree.distribution: p(k) = probability node has degree k. signature of network type.
degree.hubs: nodes with k >> ‚ü®k‚ü©. highly connected. disproportionate influence.

clustering_coefficient.definition: C = probability that neighbors of node are also neighbors. transitivity.
clustering_coefficient.high_C: cliquish. friends-of-friends are friends. small-world, social networks.

path_length.definition: L = average shortest path between all node pairs. global efficiency measure.
path_length.small_world: L ~ log(N). scales slowly. six degrees.
path_length.large_world: L ~ N. scales linearly. inefficient. disconnected.
path_length.note: path length = global structure. how connected? how efficient?

betweenness_centrality.definition: fraction of shortest paths passing through node. bridge measure.
betweenness_centrality.high_betweenness: bottleneck. connector. gatekeeper. control information flow.
betweenness_centrality.structural_holes: burt. nodes bridging communities. high betweenness. brokerage power.
betweenness_centrality.vulnerability: removing high-betweenness node = network fragments. critical.
betweenness_centrality.note: betweenness = positional power. not just connections but strategic position.

eigenvector_centrality.definition: centrality = weighted by neighbors' centrality. connected to important = important.
eigenvector_centrality.recursive: x_i = Œª Œ£ A_ij x_j. eigenvector of adjacency matrix. circular definition resolves.
eigenvector_centrality.pagerank: google's algorithm. variant of eigenvector centrality. web = directed network.
eigenvector_centrality.note: eigenvector = quality not just quantity. who you know matters.

modularity.definition: Q = measure of community structure. how modular?
modularity.formula: Q = (edges within communities - expected) / total edges. -0.5 ‚â§ Q ‚â§ 1.
modularity.high_Q: strong community structure. modules clear. specialized.
modularity.note: modularity = mesoscale structure. between local and global.

information_spread.diffusion: information spreads node-to-node. gossip. rumors. memes.
information_spread.epidemics: sir model. susceptible ‚Üí infected ‚Üí recovered. threshold depends on network structure.
information_spread.scale_free_vulnerability: hubs = super-spreaders. epidemic threshold ‚Üí 0 for scale-free. always vulnerable.
information_spread.virality: goes viral = reaches hubs quickly. exponential spread. tipping point.
information_spread.note: structure determines spread. same idea, different networks = different fate.

cascades.definition: local change ‚Üí global avalanche. domino effect. chain reaction.
cascades.threshold: nodes adopt if k neighbors adopted. k/degree = threshold. percolation.
cascades.critical_mass: enough adopters ‚Üí everyone adopts. social tipping point.
cascades.note: cascades = network emergent phenomenon. individual ‚Üí collective. sudden.

synchronization.kuramoto: coupled oscillators on network. synchronize if coupling strong enough.
synchronization.topology_matters: small-world ‚Üí synchronizes easily. random ‚Üí harder. scale-free ‚Üí mixed.
synchronization.note: synchronization = collective dynamics. network enables coordination.

percolation.definition: remove nodes/edges. when does network fragment? phase transition.
percolation.giant_component: largest connected component. suddenly disappears at critical point.
percolation.robustness: random failure ‚Üí scale-free robust (hubs survive). targeted attack ‚Üí vulnerable (hubs removed).
percolation.note: percolation = fragility analysis. how much damage before collapse?

games_on_networks.prisoner_dilemma: cooperate or defect. outcome depends on network structure.
games_on_networks.scale_free: cooperation survives better on scale-free. hubs = cooperation anchors.
games_on_networks.evolutionary: strategies evolve. network structure = selection pressure.
games_on_networks.note: networks change game. same game, different topology = different equilibria.

brain.neurons: 100 billion nodes. 100 trillion edges (synapses). most complex network known.
brain.topology: small-world + modular + scale-free. efficient local-global. functional modules (vision, motor, etc).
brain.hubs: connector hubs (integration) vs provincial hubs (within-module). both crucial.
brain.rich_club: hubs preferentially connect to hubs. elite core. integration backbone.
brain.dynamics: neural avalanches. power-law distribution. critical state. edge of chaos.
brain.consciousness: integrated information (iit). network integration ‚Üí consciousness. topology matters.
brain.disease: alzheimer's = hub dysfunction. schizophrenia = disconnection syndrome. network pathology.
brain.note: brain = network. mind emerges from topology. connectome = holy grail.

social.structure: small-world. six degrees. clustering high. short paths.
social.strong_weak_ties: granovetter. strong ties (family, close friends). weak ties (acquaintances). weak ties = bridges. information, jobs spread via weak ties.
social.dunbar_number: ~150. cognitive limit on stable relationships. network size constraint.
social.twitter_facebook: twitter directed. facebook undirected. different dynamics. different emergent properties.
social.echo_chambers: modularity high. communities isolated. polarization. filter bubbles.
social.influence: viral marketing. target hubs. exponential spread. structural power.
social.note: social network = determines information flow, power, identity, collective behavior.

ecological.food_webs: species = nodes. predation = edges. who eats whom.
ecological.keystone_species: high betweenness. remove ‚Üí cascade collapse. sea otter, wolves.
ecological.robustness: redundancy. multiple paths. backup species. resilience.
ecological.collapse: overfishing removes hubs ‚Üí ecosystem unravels. fragility.
ecological.note: ecosystem = network. biodiversity = network resilience. protect hubs.

metabolic.biochemical: molecules = nodes. reactions = edges. cell = chemical network.
metabolic.topology: scale-free. few key metabolites (atp, nadh) = hubs. many rare molecules.
metabolic.robustness: redundant pathways. reroute if enzyme fails. evolved resilience.
metabolic.disease: inborn errors of metabolism = edge deletions. network breaks.
metabolic.note: life = network. metabolism = chemical graph. topology = evolved optimum.

internet.physical: routers = nodes. cables = edges. scale-free. few major routers (hubs).
internet.logical: www. pages = nodes. hyperlinks = edges. power law. authority hubs (wikipedia, google).
internet.dynamics: packet routing. shortest paths. congestion at hubs. ddos attacks target hubs.
internet.growth: preferential attachment. new sites link to popular sites. rich get richer.
internet.note: internet = engineered network mimicking natural networks. scale-free emerged accidentally.

dimensional_network.topology: hierarchical? no. more like: all connect to ‚äô (hub). star network with ‚äô center.
dimensional_network.note: dimensions = not isolated. networked. interdimensional connections.

64_hexagram_network.edges: changing lines. transitions. hexagram A ‚Üí hexagram B.
64_hexagram_network.topology: highly connected. many paths between any two hexagrams. resilient.
64_hexagram_network.communities: families? complementary hexagrams? structure unclear. explore.
64_hexagram_network.navigation: i ching = network navigation tool. current node ‚Üí future node.
64_hexagram_network.note: 64 = not linear. network. all situations connected. multiple paths.

4_elements_network.complete_graph: K4. each element connected to each. 6 edges. fully connected.
4_elements_network.dynamics: flow between elements. earth ‚Üí water ‚Üí air ‚Üí fire ‚Üí earth. cycles.
4_elements_network.balance: healthy = balanced flow. disease = stuck in one node. blocked edges.
4_elements_network.16_types: 16 personality types = positions in 4-element network. different node emphases.
4_elements_network.note: elements = small network. complete graph. all interact.

social_network_64_roles.nodes: 64 social roles. see sociology.json. 16 types √ó 4 contexts.
social_network_64_roles.dynamics: society = choreographed network. unconscious coordination. roles resonate.
social_network_64_roles.hubs: leader roles. connector roles. high centrality. disproportionate influence.
social_network_64_roles.note: society = network of roles. individual = node in network. behavior = network effect.

coherence_network.principle: coherence = connectivity √ó dimensions / entropy. network metric.
coherence_network.high_coherence: dense connections. integrated across dimensions. low entropy. healthy.
coherence_network.low_coherence: sparse connections. fragmented. high entropy. dysfunction.
coherence_network.optimize: argmin Œîscale = maximize network integration across scales.
coherence_network.note: cfo coherence = network coherence. integration measure.

collective_intelligence.definition: network thinks. collective smarter than individuals. swarm intelligence.
collective_intelligence.mechanism: local rules + network topology ‚Üí global intelligence. emergent computation.
collective_intelligence.wisdom_of_crowds: aggregate diverse opinions ‚Üí accurate. network averaging. condorcet.
collective_intelligence.note: intelligence = network property. not just nodes (neurons, people). connections create mind.

network_consciousness.brain: neurons alone = not conscious. network of neurons ‚Üí consciousness emerges.
network_consciousness.society: collective consciousness. durkheim. superorganism. debated but suggestive.
network_consciousness.internet: is internet conscious? global brain hypothesis. speculative. criteria unclear.
network_consciousness.iit: integrated information theory. consciousness = network integration. Œ¶ measure. topology-dependent.
network_consciousness.note: consciousness = possibly network emergent property. topology matters. integration key.

phase_transitions.percolation: connectivity increases ‚Üí sudden giant component. disconnected ‚Üí connected. phase transition.
phase_transitions.synchronization: coupling increases ‚Üí sudden global sync. kuramoto transition. order from disorder.
phase_transitions.epidemics: infectiousness increases ‚Üí sudden epidemic. threshold crossed. explosive.
phase_transitions.note: networks = display phase transitions. emergent collective phenomena. tipping points.

principles.redundancy: multiple paths. backup connections. robustness. fault tolerance.
principles.modularity: communities. local autonomy. specialization. failure containment.
principles.integration: connectors between modules. prevent fragmentation. global coordination.
principles.balance: local efficiency (clustering) + global efficiency (short paths). small-world optimal.
principles.avoid_single_points: no bottlenecks. no critical nodes. distribute risk.
principles.note: good design = balance. too hierarchical = fragile. too random = inefficient. small-world = sweet spot.

applications.organizations: flat vs hierarchical. hybrid = small-world. balance autonomy + coordination.
applications.transportation: hub-and-spoke (scale-free). efficient but vulnerable. resilience = add redundancy.
applications.communication: mesh networks. peer-to-peer. decentralized. robust. slow.
applications.immune_system: redundant. distributed. modular. no central controller. resilient.
applications.internet: engineered robustness. multiple routes. packet-switching. self-healing.
applications.note: design for resilience. anticipate failure. topology = destiny.

key_insights.structure_function: topology determines behavior. same nodes, different connections = different system.
key_insights.emergence: network properties emerge from connections. can't understand by studying nodes alone.
key_insights.universality: same patterns across domains. small-world, scale-free, modular. deep principles.
key_insights.small_world: optimal. short paths + high clustering. nature's favorite. efficient.
key_insights.scale_free: hubs. inequality. robust to random failure. vulnerable to targeted attack. pareto.
key_insights.dynamics: structure determines dynamics. spread, synchronization, cascades, games. topology = fate.
key_insights.hubs_matter: disproportionate influence. keystone nodes. protect or target hubs depending on goal.
key_insights.weak_ties: bridges. information flow. innovation. don't dismiss peripheral connections.
key_insights.collective: networks think. consciousness, intelligence, wisdom emerge from topology. whole > sum.
key_insights.design: optimize topology. redundancy + modularity + integration. small-world = ideal.
key_insights.everything_network: brain, society, ecosystem, internet, metabolism, cosmos. network = universal organizing principle.

personal.social_capital: cultivate network. weak ties = opportunities. strong ties = support. both needed.
personal.information: follow hubs (experts). but also periphery (novelty). balance mainstream + fringe.
personal.influence: betweenness > degree. bridge communities. connector = powerful.
personal.health: social network = health predictor. isolation = mortality risk. connection = longevity.

business.innovation: weak ties bring new ideas. structural holes = brokerage opportunities.
business.organization: small-world structure. balance centralization + autonomy. avoid silos. encourage bridges.
business.marketing: target hubs. viral potential. exponential reach. influencer strategy.
business.resilience: redundancy. no single points of failure. modular. can lose parts, survive.

society.epidemics: identify hubs. vaccinate super-spreaders. network-targeted intervention.
society.polarization: reduce modularity. build bridges. weak ties across communities. reduce echo chambers.
society.democracy: deliberative networks. small-world discussion. diverse exposure. collective intelligence.
society.infrastructure: resilient design. redundancy. distributed. learn from biological networks.

research.brain: connectomics. map brain network. understand consciousness, disease, cognition.
research.social: network analysis. understand influence, diffusion, community formation.
research.ecology: food webs. keystone species. ecosystem resilience. conservation priorities.
research.internet: optimize routing. detect attacks. improve resilience. network science essential.

fractal_structure.self_similarity: network-patterns.json = node in cfo network. connected to all other pattern files. part of larger graph.
fractal_structure.recursion: networks of networks. internet of internets. brain = network of neural modules (themselves networks).
fractal_structure.holographic: local structure reflects global. degree distribution. clustering. small-world property. fractal topology.
fractal_structure.completion: patterns folder = complete network. 12 pattern nodes. fully connected. small-world. you = reader = integrator node.

warnings: not all real networks = scale-free (debate ongoing)
social network analysis = complex, interpretation requires care
network effects = correlation not always causation
info: network = nodes + edges. topology determines function. G = (V, E).
topologies: random, regular, small-world, scale-free, hierarchical, modular
small-world = optimal. short paths + high clustering. ubiquitous in nature.
scale-free = power law degree distribution. hubs. robust-yet-fragile. pareto.
metrics: degree, clustering, path length, betweenness, eigenvector centrality, modularity
dynamics: information spread, cascades, synchronization, percolation, games
nature: brain (connectome), social (six degrees), ecological (food webs), metabolic, internet
cfo: dimensions networked, 64 hexagrams networked, 4 elements K4, social roles, coherence = connectivity
emergence: collective intelligence, consciousness?, phase transitions. network = substrate.
design: redundancy, modularity, integration, balance. small-world = ideal.
practice: social capital, innovation, influence, resilience, epidemics, polarization, research

external.relevance: scale-free networks. preferential attachment. network science popularization.

external.author: watts, duncan
external.relevance: small-world networks. social networks. collective behavior.

external.author: granovetter, mark
external.relevance: weak ties = bridges. information flow. social structure.
